summary: Told through a looping, non-linear narrative from each of the characters' points of view, the film reconstructs the stories of a Yugoslav hit man, his former lover and her police officer boyfriend, as their paths cross in New York.
cast: Sergej Trifunovic|Geno Lechner|Peter Gevisser|Didier Flamand|Mario Padula|Al Nazemian|Liat Glick|Eric Frandsen|Kerry Johnston|Mariano Mederos|Mark Perez|Vija Vetra|Howell Seth Mayer|Renata Darlen|Eugenio Arias|Jim Browne|Sxip Shirey|Jun Kim|Al Burgo|Wendy Maples|Adam Epstein|Carol Landis|John Rodriguez|Richard Sirianni|Bob Stack|Piotr Chomiak|M. Xavier O'Connor|Michelle Xavier|Fabian Cuevas|Ron Balaguer|May Elbi|Ariel Sheldon|Laura Prokopenko|Mindy Haywood|Bianca Hanna|Deepa Jain|Thomas Vilorio|Brian Shakti
title: Love
